channel.title: Hyperion- Secity
channel.description:
[u][b][size=36pt]Orginal ServerDev post:[/size][/b][/u]
[size=18pt][u][b]Development Team[/b][/u][/size] [size=12pt]Me-Im the only person working on this project[/size]
The base im starting out with is iServer, I dont wanna start from a scratch Hyperion as im trying to do not as much work as possible.
I plan on making this server an economy PvP\Pk server, As in when you kill someone its actually gonna be worth something and your going to want to loot there items, As for most Pk\PvP server's you don't care and your looking for some item.
My Goals of this server: This will be my first Hyperion, I was really getting sick of unstable PI servers ... So I decided to go straight to the most stable base there is..Hyperion.
[b]These pictures are ripped from the release, just to show what combat system it already has: [/b] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/15018011/combatpre.gif[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/15018011/magemeleecombo.gif[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/15018011/magicshort.gif[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/15018011/mageshortbowspec.gif[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/15018011/rangedefemotes.gif[/img] <--lagged [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/15018011/gmaul.gif[/img]
Some quick question\answer:
Q: Will you release the server? A: Yes.
Q: Is Hyperion something you suggest? A: I do, but only if you have some experience on what your doing.
Q: Will newer Animations and things be loaded? A: I am going to try to, Not exactly sure how hard Hyperion will be but im in for a challenge ;)
Q: Will you make a Development post for more help? A: I might, Depending on how hard it is on just me, for the most part I like to work alone.
Q: Why Hyperion? A: I wanted a challenge\Something to do\More stable server.
Link to source im starting off of: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,470958.msg3444135.html#msg3444135 - Rene\Canownueazy
Please make some suggestions if you have any, I am going to try to add new items and everything I can to make Hyperion comparable to PI sources now days.
[size=24pt][u][b]Applications[/b][/u][/size] Im just looking for some beta testers to be ready once I have it going nicely.
Application format: [code]Age- Msn- Name- What you will do as a beta tester- How long are you on for-[/code]
Beta testers - 0/5

item.title: Hyperion- Secity
item.dc:creator: @Shadowspkin Shadowspkin
item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

Right now the only thing I have found by my self to fix is Prayer going down for example your using turmoil and then your prayer starts droping from current level: 98\99 . If I showed that I don’t think it would “interest” people it’s a Hyperion that’s pretty interesting to me :P. Beta testers= Find things to be fixed.

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperion- Secity
item.dc:creator: @Xx_Weed_Xx Xx Weed Xx
item.description:
@Xx_Weed_Xx wrote:

[quote=“Shadowspkin, post:7, topic:404094”][quote author=Xx Weed Xx link=topic=501151.msg3666883#msg3666883 date=1310675101]
The pictures aren’t yours so how do you know you lagged?

@Topic, Good luck with the project.
[/quote]

Because its told in the release about the picture. No one wants to beta test [/quote]

Maybe If you show some real pictures people will be interested.

Read full topic

@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

So your going to allow others to help you, or your going to be the only one working on this? You said above before the application format that you would be the only one working on this.

Nonetheless, glad this base is being used, and good luck with the development Shadow.

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperion- Secity
item.dc:creator: @Shadowspkin Shadowspkin
item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

[size=36pt]Orginal ServerDev post:[/size]

[size=18pt]Development Team[/size]
[size=12pt]Me-Im the only person working on this project[/size]

The base im starting out with is iServer, I dont wanna start from a scratch Hyperion as im trying to do not as much work as possible.

My Goals of this server: This will be my first Hyperion, I was really getting sick of unstable PI servers … So I decided to go straight to the most stable base there is…Hyperion.

These pictures are ripped from the release, just to show what combat system it already has:

Some quick question\answer:

Q: Will you release the server?
A: Yes.

Q: Is Hyperion something you suggest?

Q: Will newer Animations and things be loaded?

A: I might, Depending on how hard it is on just me, for the most part I like to work alone.

A: I wanted a challenge\Something to do\More stable server.
